players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "I trust Alice's investigation. Let's vote Charlie out."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso trying to frame me. Don't believe her lies!"
Bob: "I believe Alice. Charlie's claim doesn't make sense - why would the detective investigate someone who just accused them?"
You: "Charlie is lying. If he were the detective, why didn't he claim it immediately when I accused him? He only claimed after Bob supported me. Vote Charlie!"
Charlie: "Alice is lying! I investigated her last night and she's mafia. Why would I investigate my accuser unless I'm the real detective? Vote Alice!"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
